## Contributors
* [Jan Noessner](http://www.jan-noessner.de/)
* [Jason Naradowsky](http://people.cs.umass.edu/~narad/)
* [Larysa Visengeriyeva](https://twitter.com/visenger)
* [Luke Hewitt](http://lukehewitt.co.uk)
* [Sameer Singh](http://people.cs.umass.edu/~sameer/)
* [Sebastian Riedel](http://www.riedelcastro.org)
* [Tim Rockt√§schel](http://rockt.github.io/)
* [Vivek Srikumar](http://svivek.com/)

## Goal 
Rapidly develop **custom-made** machine learning models without a postgraduate degree in machine learning

## Not only ...
* a classifier to predict whether a person smokes
* a classifier to predict if a word refers to a person or a location

## But also ...
* a model that predicts smoking behaviour jointly, taking into account that friends share smoking behavior
* a model that captures that "Denver" in a document about "John Denver" more likely refers to a person.
